breathing.title: Box Breathing
breathing.desc: Inhale for 4s, hold for 4s, exhale for 4s, hold for 4s. Used by Navy SEALs for calm and focus.

breathing.title: 4-7-8 Breathing
breathing.desc: Inhale for 4s, hold for 7s, exhale for 8s. Helps reduce anxiety and aids sleep.

breathing.title: Diaphragmatic Breathing
breathing.desc: Deep belly breathing to activate the relaxation response.

activities: Go for a 10-minute walk in nature
Drink a glass of water slowly
Write down 3 things you are grateful for
Listen to your favorite calming music
Call a friend or family member
Declutter one small area of your room
Take a warm shower or bath
journal_prompts: What is one thing that made you smile today?
Describe a challenge you overcame recently.
What are you looking forward to this week?
Write a letter to your future self.
List 5 things you like about yourself.
